snippet: GHERTLER--Edna, Brooklyn-born Manhattanite, Edna attended Midwood High School, Connecticut College, and Pratt Institute. She studied modern dance with Martha Graham and worked for 25 years at the International Center of Photography. Survived by daughters Caroline Ghertler and Louise Crawford, sons-in-law Jeffrey Jacobson and Hugh Crawford, grandchildren Henry and Alice Crawford and Sonya Jacobson, her sister Rhoda Fidler. Funeral on April 10 at 1pm at Plaza Jewish Community Chapel. 1/3
lead_paragraph: GHERTLER--Edna, Brooklyn-born Manhattanite, Edna attended Midwood High School, Connecticut College, and Pratt Institute. She studied modern dance with Martha Graham and worked for 25 years at the International Center of Photography. Survived by daughters Caroline Ghertler and Louise Crawford, sons-in-law Jeffrey Jacobson and Hugh Crawford, grandchildren Henry and Alice Crawford and Sonya Jacobson, her sister Rhoda Fidler. Funeral on April 10 at 1pm at Plaza Jewish Community Chapel. 1/3
